author: dapplion
content:
Related to "Increase the MAX_EFFECTIVE_BALANCE", I'm looking at what effect have balance top-ups today. 

`MAX_SEED_LOOKAHEAD` is meant to ensure that validators strategically activating and exiting can only affect the seed 4 epochs into the future. Deposit top-ups alter the probabilities of proposers, so is that invariant broken w.r.t. to deposit top-ups once EIP6110 is active?
